Check your junk mail filters for any missing or misdirected email. ● All shipping methods will appear as an option in checkout or over the phone. ● We supply a sales receipt with all orders. ● Manufacturer mail-in rebate forms will be provided (if applicable: rebate info will be stated in the listing). Rebate offers are valid only to orders shipped to a USA address. ● Auction/BIN price already reflects any point of sale instant rebates, if applicable. ● When your package has shipped, you will be notified by email with the tracking number. ● We leave positive feedback for all eBay customers after the order has been shipped. ● Please include your eBay item number and shipping address with all correspondence. ● Please call or email us with any additional information that you feel may assist us in the processing of your order.Cameta Camera offers fast and friendly customer service.
